createAndManageNft: Create and manage your own NFTs
landingHeaderDescription: Unleash the digital artist inside you. Create NFTs from your digital artwork. Manage and launch them without needing to know the tricky side of the crypto world
question: Question
cantPublishCollectionWithoutNfts: There are no NFTs to publish
cantLaunchCollectionWithPublishedNfts: You can't launch a collection with NFTs published or pending to be published
topArtistsThatUseXRPStudio: Top Artists that use XRP Studio
collectionNftsConfirmationStepTitle: Mint NFTs in your XUMM wallet
collectionNftsConfirmationStepText: Please, sign all NFT mint transactions in your XUMM wallet in order to be sent the XRPL chain and confirmed. There are {{pendingNFTs}} NFTs left.
collectionCreationSuccessStepText: Your collection has been published successfully!
dropCreationAuthorizationStepText: Please, sign the authorization transaction on your XUMM wallet. With this transaction, XRP Studio will be able to mint all the NFTs
dropPaymentSignatureStepText: Please, sign the drop payment in your XUMM wallet.
dropPaymentConfirmationStepText: Your payment is being confirmed by the network.
dropCreationMintingStepText: The NFTs are being minted by XRP Studio. There are {{minted}} NFTs already minted. It could take a few minutes, please wait until the process is finished.
dropCreationSuccessStepText: Your drop has been published successfully!
checkoutMyCollection: Check out my collection of NFTs in XRP Studio!
checkoutThisCollection: Check out this collection of NFTs published at XRP Studio!
checkoutNft: Check out this NFT in XRP Studio!
buyRandomNft: You are about to buy a random NFT from the {{collection}} drop with a cost of {{price}} XRP.
yourOrderIsBeingPrepared: Your order is being prepared and will be ready in a few moments!
pleaseSignTransaction: Please sign the transaction weâ€™ve sent to your XUMM wallet in order to mint your NFT.
yourOrderIsBeingProcessed: Your order is being processed. Your new NFT is on the way!
youHaveMintedYourNftSuccessfully: You have minted your NFT successfully!

howItWorksSlide1Title: Create NFTs and manage your digital gallery
howItWorksSlide1Description: Easily create your collections and NFTs without any XRPL programming knowledge. You can save your pieces as a draft at no cost and work on your collections until they're ready to go!
howItWorksSlide2Title: Create awesome landing pages for your drops
howItWorksSlide2Description: You can customize your themes, sections, and layouts with the visual builder to deliver the best experience to your collectors. Your own landing page for your own collections.
howItWorksSlide3Title: Monitor the impact generated by your NFTs
howItWorksSlide3Description: Once your drops are published or launched, you can easily monitor the impact your art generates every day. Find out how far you can go!
deleteDraftDialogText: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} draft?
cantLaunchCollectionWithoutNfts: There are no NFTs to launch
launchDropInformationText: Launching a drop on XRP Studio implies the minting of all its NFTs and the creation of a sell offer for each NFT in the drop. As this task has to be done by XRP Studio, you will be asked to pay a certain amount of XRP in order to cover those costs.
launchDropInformationCost: The cost of minting your drop is {{dropNftMintCost}} XRP for each NFT. To launch your collection of {{items}} items, you will be asked to fund {{cost}} XRP as a deployment cost. Do you want to continue?
emptyDropMessage: Create a collection to launch a drop
phygitalPlaceholder: Enter your phygital NFT public key
phygitalNftDescription: This is a phygial NFT. Scan this QR to verify its authenticity.
getXrpStudioAppCTA: Don't have the XRP Studio app? Get it here!
processingYourOfferDescription: Your offer is being processed in order to validate everything is correct. Your request is on the way!
signTheTxInYourXummWallet: Sign the transaction in your XUMM wallet
signOfferDescription: Go to your XUMM wallet and sign the create offer transaction. You will have to pay a fee for creating the offer of {{fee}} {{token}}
processingYourOfferPurchase: Your purchase is being processed in order to validate everything is correct. Your purchase is on the way!
signPurchaseDescription: Go to your XUMM wallet and sign the buy Nft transaction. You will have to pay a fee for buying the nft of {{fee}} {{token}}
